display_long_description:
Shrink down and speed up! Toy Cars Racing brings the nostalgia of playing with miniature cars to life in Virtual Reality.

Forget being inside the cockpit; in this game, you get the best view of the action. Control your drift-ready sports car from an immersive third-person perspective as you tear up the asphalt. Compete in intense circuit races against aggressive opponents who are determined to cross the finish line before you.

Key Features:

Arcade Racing Action: Easy to pick up, hard to master. Slide through corners and manage your speed to keep your toy car on the track.

Nitro Boost: Need more speed? Ignite your nitro and watch the flames roar as you overtake your rivals on the straightaways.

Challenging Circuits: Race on professional-style tracks featuring grandstands, sharp curves, and scenic mountain backdrops.

Competitive AI: You aren't driving alone. Battle for position against a grid of colorful opponents. Can you finish 1st?

Immersive VR View: Enjoy a comfortable 'follow-cam' view that gives you perfect awareness of the track and the racers around you.

Ready to relive your childhood racing dreams? Grab your controller and start your engines in Toy Cars Racing!
